channel.title: CVE Feed for ManageEngine -- Endpoint Central
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ManageEngine -- Endpoint Central

item.title: CVE-2024-38868|2024-08-30T17:59:41.602Z -- manageengine -- endpoint%20central
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine Endpoint Central affected by Incorrect authorization vulnerability while isolating the devices.This issue affects Endpoint Central: before 11.3.2406.08 and before 11.3.2400.15

item.title: CVE-2024-38869|2024-08-30T18:47:26.580Z -- manageengine -- endpoint%20central
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine Endpoint Central affected by Incorrect authorization vulnerability in remote office deploy configurations.This issue affects Endpoint Central: before 11.3.2416.04 and before 11.3.2400.25.

item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine Endpoint Central affected by Incorrect authorization vulnerability in remote office deploy configurations.This issue affects Endpoint Central: before 11.3.2416.04 and before 11.3.2400.25.

item.title: CVE-2024-38868|2024-08-30T17:44:38.932Z -- manageengine -- endpoint%20central
